original_title: Student-led Serbia protests demand fresh elections amid ongoing violence | Fox News
article_summary: Anti-corruption protests in Serbia, led by students, have intensified over the past week, demanding new elections and accountability following a railway station collapse. The protests, which have turned violent, are a response to the government's perceived failure to address corruption and uphold the rule of law, with tens of thousands participating since December. The situation is escalating, and some analysts believe that elections may be the only solution to stabilize the country.</s>
